name: Hymettus: The Hidden Lab
description:
Hymettus: The Hidden Lab is a multiplayer survival game set in a hidden base on top of Hymettus, a mountain in Athens, Greece with significant military presence.

After finding evidence of extraterrestrial life, scientists captured some aliens along with a mysterious core. During the experiments, they powered the core up, and so the captive aliens received superhuman powers and went amok, killing everyone in the lab.

A containment team is sent to clean up, make sure the aliens don't leave the lab, and that nobody ever hears of what happened there.

It's up to them to secure the base and destroy the alien core.

Will they make it?
